languages.text: {n}Несмотря на короткие смены и придирчивый контроль, многие трансмеханики были подвергнуты утилизации после контактов с чудовищной машиной. Но обрывки информации, добываемые ими, оправдывали их жертву.{/n}

{n}Despite the short shifts and meticulous control, many Transmechanics were disposed of after their contact with the monstrous machine. But the small scraps of information they obtained justified their sacrifice.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Несмотря на короткие смены и придирчивый контроль, многие трансмеханики были подвергнуты утилизации после контактов с чудовищной машиной. Но обрывки информации, добываемые ими, оправдывали их жертву.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Despite the short shifts and meticulous control, many Transmechanics have been disposed of after their contact with the monstrous machine. But the scraps of information they could obtain justified their sacrifice.{/n}

{n}Despite the short shifts and meticulous control, many Transmechanics have been disposed of after their contact with the monstrous machine. But the scraps of information they could obtain justified their sacrifice.{/n}

{n}Despite the short shifts and meticulous control, many Transmechanics were disposed of after their contact with the monstrous machine. But the small scraps of information they obtained justified their sacrifice.{/n}

{n}Despite the short shifts and meticulous control, many Transmechanics were disposed of after their contact with the monstrous machine. But the small scraps of information they obtained justified their sacrifice.{/n}

{n}Despite the short shifts and meticulous control, many Transmechanics were disposed of after their contact with the monstrous machine. But the small scraps of information they obtained justified their sacrifice.{/n}

{n}Despite the short shifts and meticulous control, many Transmechanics were disposed of after their contact with the monstrous machine. But the small scraps of information they obtained justified their sacrifice.{/n}

languages.text: {n}尽管轮班时间很短，控制也很细致，但许多接触过这台可怕机器的传讯修士事后还是被处理掉了。不过，他们的牺牲没有白费，他们获得了许多零散的信息。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Despite the short shifts and meticulous control, many Transmechanics were disposed of after their contact with the monstrous machine. But the small scraps of information they obtained justified their sacrifice.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}尽管轮班时间很短，控制也很细致，但许多接触过这台可怕机器的传讯修士事后还是被处理掉了。不过，他们的牺牲没有白费，他们获得了许多零散的信息。{/n}

languages.text: {n}A pesar de los cortos turnos y el meticuloso control, muchos transmecánicos fueron eliminados tras su contacto con la monstruosa máquina. Pero los pequeños retazos de información que obtenían justificaban su sacrificio.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Despite the short shifts and meticulous control, many Transmechanics were disposed of after their contact with the monstrous machine. But the small scraps of information they obtained justified their sacrifice.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}A pesar de los cortos turnos y el meticuloso control, muchos transmecánicos fueron eliminados tras su contacto con la monstruosa máquina. Pero los pequeños retazos de información que obtenían justificaban su sacrificio.{/n}

languages.text: {n}短時間のシフトと入念な管理を行ったにもかかわらず、多くのトランスメカニックが怪物のような機械と接触した後に処分された。しかし、彼らが得た情報の断片は、彼らの犠牲を正当化するものだった。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Despite the short shifts and meticulous control, many Transmechanics were disposed of after their contact with the monstrous machine. But the small scraps of information they obtained justified their sacrifice.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}短時間のシフトと入念な管理を行ったにもかかわらず、多くのトランスメカニックが怪物のような機械と接触した後に処分された。しかし、彼らが得た情報の断片は、彼らの犠牲を正当化するものだった。{/n}

languages.text: {n}En dépit de prises de poste écourtées et de contrôles méticuleux, de nombreux transmécaniciens doivent être éliminés après être entrés en contact avec la machine monstrueuse. Néanmoins, les bribes d'informations qu'ils parviennent à obtenir justifient amplement leur sacrifice.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Despite the short shifts and meticulous control, many Transmechanics were disposed of after their contact with the monstrous machine. But the small scraps of information they obtained justified their sacrifice.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}En dépit de prises de poste écourtées et de contrôles méticuleux, de nombreux transmécaniciens doivent être éliminés après être entrés en contact avec la machine monstrueuse. Néanmoins, les bribes d'informations qu'ils parviennent à obtenir justifient amplement leur sacrifice.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Trotz der kurzen Schichten und penibler Kontrolle wurden viele Transmechaniker nach ihrem Kontakt mit der monströsen Maschine entsorgt. Die winzigen Fetzen an Information, die sie erlangt hatten, rechtfertigten ihr Opfer.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Despite the short shifts and meticulous control, many Transmechanics were disposed of after their contact with the monstrous machine. But the small scraps of information they obtained justified their sacrifice.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Trotz der kurzen Schichten und penibler Kontrolle wurden viele Transmechaniker nach ihrem Kontakt mit der monströsen Maschine entsorgt. Die winzigen Fetzen an Information, die sie erlangt hatten, rechtfertigten ihr Opfer.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Kısa vardiyalar ve titiz denetime rağmen birçok Transmekanik, dehşet saçan makineyle temas kurduktan sonra canlarından oldu. Fakat elde ettikleri ufak tefek bilgiler, fedakârlıklarına değdi.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Despite the short shifts and meticulous control, many Transmechanics were disposed of after their contact with the monstrous machine. But the small scraps of information they obtained justified their sacrifice.{/n}
